title: Diamond-Accented Gold Thread Necklace - A Contemporary Haaram
materials: Brilliant-cut Diamonds (D.wt:-0.25(5) D.wt(10):-2.03(20)). Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: This exquisite necklace showcases a modern interpretation of the classic Haaram. Fine gold threads are elegantly interspersed with diamond-studded floral motifs. The design balances traditional aesthetics with a contemporary minimalist approach.
colors: Lustrous Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds create a timeless and elegant color palette.
occasions: and sophisticated modern gatherings. A versatile piece that complements both traditional sarees and contemporary attire.
description: A delicate fusion of tradition and modernity, this gold and diamond necklace offers unparalleled elegance. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, while the brilliant diamonds add a touch of luxury. A timeless investment that will be treasured for generations.
